title: The Adobe Creative Cloud Book - 2014  UK
description:
The Adobe Creative Cloud Book - 2014  UK

196 Pages | True PDF | English | 22 MB 


Delve into the creative world of Adobe, and get to know four of its most-used programs. Whether it's photo editing or illustrating, designing layouts or enhancing video clips, discover top tips and follow step-by-step tutorials. You'll find your creative projects will be easier and look better in no time at all. Featuring: Photoshop - Whether you want to retouch an image or apply more sophisticated edits, Photoshop can help. InDesign - Produce eye-catching layouts, collect all your assets, and create PDFs for both print and digital publishing. Illustrator - Develop your artistic skills with Illustrator to create vector portraits and artwork, and draw digitally. After Effects - Enhance your video clips and turn them into cinematic masterpieces in After Effects.
